ingredient_sets.ingredients: beef, onions, carrots, potatoes, red wine

set_1.title: Creamy Chicken, Broccoli, and Rice Casserole**
set_1.ingredients:
- 1 1/2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast or thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
- 2 cups uncooked white or brown rice
- 3 cups broccoli florets
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 1/2 cup heavy cream or half-and-half
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (optional)

- 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small pieces
- 2 cups cooked rice (preferably day-old rice)
- 3 cups broccoli florets
- 2 tablespoons Gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 teaspoon grated ginger
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup chopped green onions for garnish
- Salt and pepper, to taste

- 1 1/2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast or thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 2 cups cooked white or brown rice
- 3 cups broccoli florets
- 2 tablespoons gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 2 tablespoons rice vinegar
- 1 teaspoon grated ginger
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
- Sesame seeds and chopped green onions for garnish (optional)

- 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small pieces
- 2 cups cooked rice (preferably day-old rice)
- 1 cup broccoli florets
- 1/4 cup gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons Gochugaru (Korean chili flakes)
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon grated ginger
- 1 egg, lightly beaten
- 1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs
- Salt and pepper to taste

- 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small pieces
- 2 cups cooked rice (preferably day-old rice)
- 1 cup broccoli florets
- 1/4 cup gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons rice vinegar
- 1 tablespoon Gochugaru (Korean red pepper flakes)
- 1 teaspoon sesame oil
- 1/4 cup chopped green onions for garnish
- 1/4 cup toasted sesame seeds for garnish
- 1 egg, lightly beaten (for egg wash)
- Vegetable oil for frying

set_2.title: Summer Pasta Delight**
set_2.ingredients:
- 8 oz pasta of your choice (linguine or fettuccine work well)
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
- Salt, to taste
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, to taste
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (optional)

- 8 oz pasta of your choice (e.g., penne, fusilli, or farfalle)
- 2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/2 cup grated mozzarella cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)

- 8 oz pasta of choice (e.g., spaghetti or soba noodles)
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tbsp Gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 1 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp grated ginger
- 1/4 tsp red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 cup toasted sesame seeds for garnish
- 1/4 cup crushed kimchi (optional, for added flavor)

- 8 oz pasta of your choice (linguine or soba work well)
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon honey
- 1 teaspoon grated ginger
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 cup chopped green onions for garnish

- 8 oz pasta of your choice (e.g., spaghetti or soba noodles)
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons Gochujang (Korean chili paste)
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 teaspoon grated ginger
- 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional, for some heat)
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 1/4 cup toasted sesame seeds and chopped green onions, for garnish

set_3.title: Pan-Seared Salmon with Lemon-Dill Potatoes**
set_3.ingredients:
- 4 salmon fillets (6 ounces each)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch wedges
- 2 lemons, juiced
- 1/4 cup fresh dill, chopped
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste

- 4 salmon fillets (6 ounces each)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch wedges
- 1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
- 2 tablespoons freshly chopped dill
- 2 lemons, zested and juiced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup microgreens (such as pea shoots or purslane)
- Fresh dill sprigs for garnish

- 4 salmon fillets (6 oz each)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and chopped into 1-inch cubes
- 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 1/4 cup semolina flour
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup dill, chopped
- 2 lemons, zested and juiced
- 4 tbsp unsalted butter
- Salt and pepper to taste

- 4 salmon fillets (6 oz each)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cubed
- 2 lemons, juiced
- 1/4 cup fresh dill, chopped
- 1 cup quinoa, rinsed and drained
- 2 cups water
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 1 tsp garlic powder

- 4 salmon fillets (6 oz each)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and grated
- 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh dill
- 2 lemons, zested and juiced
- 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 tablespoons butter
- Micro greens (such as pea shoots or purslane) for garnish

set_4.title: Braised Beef with Root Vegetables in Red Wine**
set_4.ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. beef round tip steak, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 4 medium carrots, peeled and sliced
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cubed
- 1 cup dry red wine
- 2 tbsp. olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (optional)

- 1 lb. beef, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes
- 2 large onions, thinly sliced
- 4 large carrots, peeled and grated
- 2 large potatoes, thinly sliced
- 1 cup red wine
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp dried thyme
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 sheet of frozen puff pastry, thawed
- 1 egg, beaten (for egg wash)

- 1.5 lbs beef short ribs or chuck, cut into 2-inch pieces
- 2 large onions, thinly sliced
- 4 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
- 1 cup red wine
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
- 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (optional)

- 1 lb. beef, cut into small pieces
- 2 medium onions, diced
- 4 medium carrots, peeled and grated
- 2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 cup red wine
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 2 cups empanada dough (homemade or store-bought)
- 1 egg, beaten (for egg wash)

- 1 lb. beef, cut into small cubes
